lead_paragraph: The White House pulled back on part of Mr. Trump’s temporary ban on visitors from seven countries by saying that it would not apply to those with green cards.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Nicholas Fandos, Eric Lichtblau, Eric Lipton, Ron Nixon, Matthew Rosenberg, Charlie Savage and Michael D. Shear from Washington; Nicholas Kulish, Sean Piccoli and Liam Stack from New York; Alison Smale from Berlin; Steven Erlanger from London; and Alissa J. Rubin from Paris.

headline.main: Travelers Stranded and Protests Swell Over Trump Order
headline.print_headline: Trump Modifies Ban on Migrants as Outcry Grows

snippet: The White House pulled back on part of Mr. Trump’s temporary ban on visitors from seven countries by saying that it would not apply to those with green cards....
